'''White Pigeon''' is a type of pigeon which can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=274 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found at [[Thousand Winds Temple]] and the bridge just outside of [[Mondstadt]] where [[Timmie]] is.
